chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The other day, I requested an iPhone 13 with 128 GB, blue color, and a very good appearance. However, it has many paint details on the edges due to impacts! The functionality is okay! It's my fourth phone with you guys, and the condition was very good, but considering what happened, I'm requesting a mobile phone change with the same technical characteristics and possibly without so many details! Or the option to opt for one with an aesthetic

Dear ecomobile:

The customer has returned the device, as it did not correspond to the requested aesthetic grade. 

He requests to be sent a replacement, if this is not possible, he refunds the order.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Skarlet from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of your message and will inform our repair team accordingly.

Regards,
JH

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>replacement<<. Please provide a solution to the customer within 1 business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button at the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Ana Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
